title: Address Labels Configuration
description: Schema for blockchain address labeling configuration following Etherscan API response format

status.description: API response status code (1 for success, 0 for error)

message.description: API response message (OK for success, error description for failure)

address.description: Ethereum address in hexadecimal format (0x followed by 40 hex characters)

nametag.description: Human-readable name or identifier for the address

url.description: Optional URL associated with the address (e.g., project website)

labels.description: Array of category labels for the address

reputation.description: Reputation score for the address (0 for neutral, positive for trusted, negative for suspicious)

lastUpdatedTimestamp.description: Unix timestamp of the last update to this address label
